long_description: You don't have to spend a fortune to get a good night's sleep in the great outdoors. The affordable Klymit Static V sleeping pad cushions you from the hard ground on summertime backpacking adventures. V-shape chambers limit air movement and heat loss; chambers also help the pad stay with your every move as you sleep. Chambers evenly distribute the air for great comfort; inflated side rails help keep you on the pad. Static V pad can be inflated with just 10 - 15 breaths; easy-to-use push valve allows for quick deflation. Rolled up, Klymit Static V sleeping pad is about the size of a standard Nalgene water bottle. Constructed from 75-denier polyester for durability. Pad includes a stuff sack and patch kit.
short_description: You don't have to spend a fortune to get a good night's sleep in the great outdoors. The affordable Klymit Static V sleeping pad cushions you from the hard ground on summertime backpacking adventures.
